item.title: So I had the "amazon Client" base... and
item.dc:creator: @Maticus Maticus
item.description:
@Maticus wrote:

Apparently fileden no longer has the cache files for the amazon client base, so I made my own. I went into client.java and changed the url of the cache to the url of my new file, “Cache.zip” on a private webhosting service.( I made the cache.zip from the .amazon_cache folder I had already.)

So, It shows as

} if(abyte0 == null) { method13(15, (byte)4, "Downloading Cache, don't quit now!"); Updater.get("http://blah.com/cache.zip", "cache.zip", "", "cache"); } if(aClass14Array970[0] != null) { abyte0 = aClass14Array970[0].method233(true, i); }

But all I get is a connection error after I compile. Is there anything else I need to change?

Read full topic
